semantic_search.title: Semantic Search
semantic_search.description: Search by meaning, not just keywords.
semantic_search.sql: select sections.main_title, sections.article, sections.section_id, sections.content, vec_sections.distance from vec_sections join sections on vec_sections.rowid = sections.id where vec_sections.embedding match embed_text(:query) and k = 10 order by vec_sections.distance
